
# Working with Databases in R

June 12, 2021

Collaboration between R-Ladies Nairobi and #NairobiR

Speaker: Christopher Maronga, Data Manager (Clinical), KEMRI-Wellcome Trust

The tutorial covered:

* Efficiently connecting R to RDBMS

* Querying data stored in the RDBMS via R

* Connecting and exporting data from REDCap

* API security
